title: HelloTel App now available for Apple Watch Users
text:
HelloTel App now available for Apple Watch Users Travel app also employs complete redesign to align with wearable features July 22, 2015 10:46 ET | Source: HelloTel App 
CHICO, CA, July 22,   HelloTel App , the Traveler's Social Network, has entered the wearable realm and released its version of the app for Apple Watch users. HelloTel is one of only 10 travel apps to successfully make the leap from iPhone and iPad to Apple Watch. "Few travel apps in HelloTel's space have made the jump from mobile device to wearable, so we feel this helps set us apart," said HelloTel founder and developer, Marc Lewis. "We like where we sit, and we love the functionalities HelloTel offers on Apple Watch." Expect to see nearly every functionality found on HelloTel's iPhone and iPad versions on Apple Watch. Users will be able to: Check-in to search and find nearby hotels View other users' profiles Send and read private messages View their notifications Receive push notifications to Apple Watch 
Additionally, HelloTel will offer its own unique Glances page with the most recent notifications of users checking into your hotel and other nearby hotels. To see what HelloTel looks like on Apple Watch, visit our Facebook gallery here . HelloTel is also finalizing a completely redesigned version of the app to match Apple Watch. This new look will be uploaded within the next 14 days. 
About HelloTel App 
Launched in Oct. 2014, HelloTel App is a free mobile app available on iOS and Android, and now on Apple Watch. HelloTel lets users search for and "check-in" to their hotel, and connects hotel guests together like never before by allowing them to post comments and direct message each other. For more information, visit http://www.hellotelapp.com , like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/hellotelapp or follow us on Twitter and Instagram at http://www.twitter.com/hellotelapp and http://www.instagram.com/hellotelapp .
